name: Vatican Mascot
description: Luce is a mascot character created by the Vatican and Catholic Church. The Catholic Church created Luce from their desire to enter into the world of pop culture, which is so beloved by young people. $LUCE on Ethereum is a non-affiliated meme coin created based on the Luce mascot character. Luce doesn't have any utility; it's a community-run 'community takeover' coin meant to unite crypto people together through something warm and funny.something warm and funny.
